p: Visual assessments of the farms by trained research assistants showed that the prevalence of MLN in 2015 differed across regions ( P = 0.0012) and villages ( P < 0.0001). The highest MLN prevalence was recorded in Kilimanjaro with a mean of 22% symptomatic maize plants, followed by Arusha (14%) and Manyara (10%). The prevalence did not differ across agro-ecological zones ( P > 0.05; Table 1).
